original_text: But someone may believe in God. He does not work to cause God to accept him. God accepts that person because of their faith. God says that people who have turned away from him are right with him, if they trust him. That is God's gift to them.
korean_text: 일을 아니할지라도 경건하지 아니한 자를 의롭다 하시는 이를 믿는 자에게는 그의 믿음을 의로 여기시나니

sentences.original_text: But someone may believe in God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 어떤 사람은 하나님을 믿을 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: He does not work to cause God to accept him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님이 그를 받아들이시게 하기 위해 일하지 않습니다.

sentences.original_text: God accepts that person because of their faith.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 그들의 믿음 때문에 그 사람을 받아들입니다.

sentences.original_text: God says that people who have turned away from him
are right with him, if they trust him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 신뢰한다면 그와 올바른 관계에 있다고 말합니다.

sentences.original_text: That is God's gift to them.
